mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project1_board (category, seq, title, content, userPk, boardMainImg) SELECT #{category}, IFNULL(MAX(seq), 0) +1, #{title}, #{content}, #{userPk}, #{boardMainImg} FROM project1_board WHERE category = #{category}
mapper.select: SELECT A.boardPk, A.category, A.title , A.content, DATE_FORMAT(A.regDt, '%Y년 %m월 %d일 (%H:%i)') as regDt , A.userPk, B.userNm AS writerNm, B.profileImg FROM project1_board A INNER JOIN project1_user B ON A.userPk = B.userPk WHERE boardPk = ${boardPk}

SELECT A.boardPk, A.seq, A.title, A.hits, A.regDt , A.userPk, B.userNm AS writerNm, B.profileImg, A.content, A.boardMainImg FROM project1_board A INNER JOIN project1_user B ON A.userPk = B.userPk WHERE A.category = #{category} AND A.isDel = 0 ORDER BY boardPk DESC LIMIT #{start}, #{itemCountPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM project1_board WHERE category = ${category} AND isDel = 0
mapper.update:
